identified-content.person: PENGLASE, DR. MARTHA DENISE (DR. MARTHA DENISE GARCIA)

block.p: Dr. Martha Denise Penglase, a daughter of Hilary and Frank Penglase of New York, was married yesterday to Jesus Adrian Garcia, a son of Enedina Garcia of Phoenix and Ernesto Garcia of Corcoran, Calif. The Rev. Dr. Allison Stokes, a United Church of Christ minister, performed the ceremony at the First Congregational Church in Stockbridge, Mass.

The couple met at Harvard University, from which the bride graduated cum laude and received her medical degree. The bridegroom is now a fourth-year medical student there and is also a candidate for a Ph.D. in neurobiology.

Dr. Martha Denise Penglase, a daughter of Hilary and Frank Penglase of New York, was married yesterday to Jesus Adrian Garcia, a son of Enedina Garcia of Phoenix and Ernesto Garcia of Corcoran, Calif. The Rev. Dr. Allison Stokes, a United Church of Christ minister, performed the ceremony at the First Congregational Church in Stockbridge, Mass.

The couple met at Harvard University, from which the bride graduated cum laude and received her medical degree. The bridegroom is now a fourth-year medical student there and is also a candidate for a Ph.D. in neurobiology.

Dr. Garcia, 31, is a chief resident in obstetrics and gynecology at the Brigham and Women's Hospital in Boston. Her father is a senior vice president and the treasurer of the McGraw-Hill Companies, the publishers, and her mother teaches the fifth grade at the Ethical Culture School, both in New York.
The bridegroom, 29, graduated cum laude from Loyola Marymount University. His mother is a lobby attendant at the Ritz Carlton in Phoenix. His father is a retired farm worker.
